page.title: 13DRINKING HABITS
page.content: In our area there are only three public houses which is fairly surprising. Since the population is only about seven hundred and fifty people strong this number is interesting. Farmers, however are very well known for their great love of drinking and many often go down to the local public house for a drink. In the area many people will go down to the public house to meet their collegues with a drink at the weekend. The people do not drink a great deal at home and it is only when entertaining that they get out any alcoholic drink.
